main event: An unidentified aerial object was sighted in Cincinnati, Ohio on November 9, 1956, which appeared bright and then disappeared before reappearing.
interesting points: The sighting was visually confirmed and supported by ground radar,The object was described as being bright white,The duration of the sighting was between 3 to 6 seconds,Multiple possible explanations were suggested including a balloon, aircraft, or meteor, and the object's disappearance occurred 2 to 3 miles away behind the horizon.
sighted object: a bright white unidentified aerial object
